name: com.shadercrew.the-toon-shader.core
description:
Core functionality and shared utilities for all 2D and 3D The Toon Shader.
Includes base scripts, common resources, and foundational systems used by both 2D and 3D Toon Shader packages.

Note: This package is a dependency for The Toon Shader-2D and The Toon Shader-3D. It is not intended for direct use in projects.
